notes.note: Wish you hadn't tapped "Close all Tabs?" "Undo" to the rescue!
Long-pressing on the Back/Forward buttons lets you leap through your history
Sync Tabs and History...together at last!
We've packaged the most useful tools in a new, easy-to-access menu. Try it out!

Get to your favorite page fast by [setting it as your home page][1]


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/set-homepage-firefox-ios

Want to install the [Qwant search plug-in][1]? If you're in the UK, Germany or France, now you can. Enjoy!


  [1]: https://www.qwant.com/

Want more search engines? [Now you can add them from your favorite websites][1]


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/add-search-engines-firefox-ios

Untangle and go wireless! [Get things done quickly with these keyboard shortcuts][1]


  [1]: https://support.mozilla.org/kb/keyboard-shortcuts-firefox-ios

If you’re in China, you can now do cool things such as:

 - Set new tabs to open your home page. Yesss!
 - Customize your home screen, including top sites and panels.
